summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3410 for the improvement of Ohio Avenue, from West Dawson Street to Diagonal Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42250, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
